subject: Baseball
organizations: Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania
lead_paragraph: Despite his degree from the University of Pennsylvania, the Cubs’ utilityman-turned-versatile weapon Mark DeRosa is a thinking-man’s player who doesn’t spend too much time thinking.
snippet: Despite his degree from the University of Pennsylvania, the Cubs’ utilityman-turned-versatile weapon Mark DeRosa is a thinking-man’s player who doesn’t spend too much time thinking.
